scripts.lint: npm run protocol:validate && (cd services/runner && go vet ./...) && (cd extensions/vscode && npm run lint)
scripts.test: (cd services/runner && go test ./...) && (cd extensions/vscode && npm run test)
scripts.build: (cd services/runner && go build ./...) && (cd extensions/vscode && npm run build)
scripts.verify:fast: npm run lint && npm run typecheck
scripts.verify:full: npm run verify:fast && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.verify:smoke: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && cd services/runner && go build ./...
